title: greentech2
author: greentech2
content: I use Yoroi wallet to delegate ADA Cardano in Chrome and it doesn't work.  It pops up "Processing Fetching pool information" window and then disappear.  It doesn't display to the screen that I can delegate.  Do you know the problem?  Thanks.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Have you also checked if the pool you're trying to join is still capable of accepting new delegators? Perhaps that's another thing you need to look at. You can try another pool to test this. If none of that works then maybe it's a Chrome problem like blocking some features of the Yoroi wallet. Why don't you try using the mobile app instead?

comments.author: greentech2
comments.body: I can do it in the Google Pixel 6 Android app.Thank you very much.
